function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conspiracy linking 5G and COVID-19 leading to disrupted connectivity","Impact":"Disruption of network connectivity affecting e-health solutions","Mitigation":"Clearing out inaccurate social beliefs with the support of civil society and governments","Technologies":"Media and communication platforms for spreading accurate information","People":"General public, e-health users","Owner":"Experts, media, civil society, governments"},{"Description":"Technical literacy requirement for 5G solutions","Impact":"Exclusion of many people due to lack of technical literacy","Mitigation":"Making applications easier to use and execute on average hardware and devices","Technologies":"User-friendly interfaces, accessibility features","People":"People with low technical literacy","Owner":"Technology developers, e-health solution providers"},{"Description":"Resistance and deterrence of health personnel from using new e-health systems","Impact":"Resistance to using new systems with additional complexity, or requiring additional effort/time","Mitigation":"Minimizing the effort required by clinicians, ease of use for patients and support users","Technologies":"Clinical decision support systems, user-friendly interfaces","People":"Health professionals, patients, family members","Owner":"Health institutions, e-health solution providers"}]}
